subject: Delivery
description_text:
Hi,

Just wanted to see when my order will be shipped. Paid for fast delivery,
says 1-2d to ship, but it looks like it hasn't been shipped.

Order #SSN3472
Thanks,

Audrius Kliopkinas

conversations.body_text: Hi Audrius Kliopkinas,    We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with replenishment expected next week. Your order will be dispatched via DHL once stock is available.

Hi,

Why did I pay for fast delivery then?

On Wed, 19 Nov 2025 at 12:55, service@simsonn.com
Hi Audrius Kliopkinas,    Please do not worry, we shall refund the additional delivery charges for you.

Hi,

When can I expect shipping refund?

I also want to order pedal base plate, but not going to chose fast delivery
as it's not urgent. is it possible to get a discount for base plate instead
of refund?

On Wed, 19 Nov 2025 at 13:02, service@simsonn.com

Hi,

Reminder, since no reply.

Thanks,

Audrius Kliopkinas
